transArray.content: The hotel's breakfast is okay, and the serving time is long, until noon. There are freshly cooked noodles and yogurt. The service of the hotel is also good, and the facilities are relatively new. The location of the hotel is good, at the south entrance of Qianmen Pedestrian Street. When staying in a room with a view, it is best to have a waiter guide you, otherwise you will be dizzy.
